Helpful Bookmarks

Oct 27, 2017

Here’s an ever growing list of site’s I have in my bookmarks that I believe you might also find useful. Let me know in the comments what your favorites are, maybe they’ll end up in this list.

Tools

HemingwayApp - Hemingway editor, smarter than Grammarly.
Slack - Team communications tool.
LastPass Password Generator - Generates passwords so you don’t have to.
Git Guide - Roger Dudler’s super simple Git guide.
Edit Mac Hosts File - How to edit your Mac’s hosts file and why you would want to.
Git Basics - Git basics from Gitlab’s perspective.
Sketchboard - Creative team sketching and diagramming on an endless online whiteboard.
Markdown Cheatsheet - Super useful helper for Markdown.
Airtable - Looks Like A Spreadsheet - Acts Like A Database‎.

Design

Unsplash - Beautiful, free photos. Gifted by the world’s most generous community of photographers.
Pixabay - Free images.
Subtle Patterns - Subtle, seamless patterns.
Gridulator - Make pixel grids, lickety-split
Get the Font - Find font downloads by name.

WordPress

Hardening WordPress
The Beginners Guide to Actions and Filters
25 Extremely Useful Function Tricks
15 Essential WP Functions
GenerateWP
WordPress’ Famous 5 Minute Install

Linux

How do I Compress a Whole Linux or UNIX Directory?
How to use grep
How to Install Rsnapshot on Ubuntu 12.04 (reference only)
How To Set Up Apache Virtual Hosts on Ubuntu 16.04
Initial Server Setup with CentOS 7

Project Management Systems

Trello
Freedcamp
Taiga
Asana
